## {.sidebar width="280px"}

### Year Range


Use the slider to filter the timeline starting from a specific year.


---


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
dashboardr::render_input(
  input_id = "year_slider",
  label = "Start Year:",
  type = "slider",
  filter_var = "year",
  options = NULL,
  options_from = NULL,
  default_selected = NULL,
  placeholder = "Select...",
  width = "300px",
  min = 2018,
  max = 2024,
  step = 1,
  value = 2018,
  show_value = TRUE,
  inline = TRUE,
  stacked = FALSE,
  stacked_align = "center",
  group_align = "left",
  ncol = NULL,
  nrow = NULL,
  toggle_series = NULL,
  override = FALSE,
  labels = NULL,
  size = "md",
  help = NULL,
  disabled = FALSE
)
```

## Column

### GDP Growth Over Time

```{r timeline-value-country-4}
# GDP Growth Over Time
result <- viz_timeline(
  data = data,
  title = "GDP Growth Over Time",
  time_var = "year",
  y_var = "value",
  group_var = "country",
  agg = "none",
  chart_type = "line",
  y_label = "Growth Rate (%)",
  x_label = "Year"
)

# Extract cross-tab data BEFORE wrapping (wrapping strips attributes)
cross_tab_data <- attr(result, 'cross_tab_data')
cross_tab_config <- attr(result, 'cross_tab_config')
cross_tab_id <- attr(result, 'cross_tab_id')

# Embed cross-tab data for client-side filtering
if (!is.null(cross_tab_data)) {
  cross_tab_json <- jsonlite::toJSON(cross_tab_data, dataframe = 'rows')
  config_json <- jsonlite::toJSON(cross_tab_config, auto_unbox = TRUE)
  script_tag <- htmltools::tags$script(
    htmltools::HTML(paste0(
      'window.dashboardrCrossTab = window.dashboardrCrossTab || {};',
      'window.dashboardrCrossTab["', cross_tab_id, '"] = {',
      'data: ', cross_tab_json, ',',
      'config: ', config_json,
      '};'
    ))
  )
  result <- htmltools::tagList(script_tag, result)
}

result
```
